Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 186 (landlord-tenant.proposition: See generally Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 186 (landlord-tenant law) and Massachusetts common law recognizing the covenant of quiet enjoyment (common-law sources and treatises such as the Restatement (Second) of Property describe the covenant and its elements).
